K01vinv07_u:2: jīvako bhāṅgakaś caiva tathā dīrghadaśāni ca /
K01vinv07_u:9: khaṇḍo gopaś ca siṃhaś ca vaiśālīgamanaṃ tathā /
K01vinv07_u:14: yamunā śivapathikā vaiśālyām akṣi śatapadī sapta /
K01vinv07_u:17: rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca /
K01vinv07_u:19: khaṇḍo 'grāmātyo dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati nyāyataś ca vyavahārān paśyati yataḥ sarva eva janakāyas tanmukho 'vasthitaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:23: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:24: tasya trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃśati divasān pūrvavad yāvad gopa iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam* /
K01vinv07_u:25: bhūyo 'py asya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:26: tasyāpi pūrvavad vistareṇa siṃha iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam* /
K01vinv07_u:27: gopaḥ siṃhaś ca kramaśas taruṇau saṃvṛttau /
K01vinv07_u:28: khaṇḍo 'grāmātyaḥ pūrvam eva śūro vikrāntaḥ pañcasu sthāneṣu kṛtāvi yenāmātyānām agraḥ /
K01vinv07_u:29: yadā putrabalī jātas tadā bhūyasyā mātrayā sarvāmātyān abhibhūyāvasthitaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:30: tatas te 'mātyā upahatatejasaḥ parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kṛtvā saṃjātāmarṣā rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ /
K01vinv07_u:34: kuto bhavatāṃ vimarṣo 'haṃ rājā ko 'nya iti /
K01vinv07_u:37: yadi tasyābhirucitaṃ syād devaṃ rājyāc cyāvayitvā svayam eva paṭṭaṃ baddhā rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayed iti /
K01vinv07_u:39: sarva ete tenābhibhūtās tena bhedaṃ kurvantīti /
K01vinv07_u:40: yāvad apareṇa samayena rājā amātyagaṇaparivṛtas tiṣṭhati /
K01vinv07_u:43: yadā tu rājakṛtiṃ kṛtvā niṣkrāntas tadā tad rājakulaṃ śūnyam avasthitam* /
K01vinv07_u:49: yadi (MSV II 5) khaṇḍasyābhirucitaṃ syād eva rājyāc cyāvayitvā svayam eva paṭṭaṃ baddhā rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayed iti /
K01vinv07_u:61: yadi śrāvastīṃ gāmiṣyāmi rājādhīnā śrāvastī tatrāpy eṣa evādīnavaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:62: evaṃ vārāṇasyāṃ rājagṛhe caṇpāyām ekādhīnatvād eṣa evādīnavaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:67: gacchāmy ahaṃ bhavatāṃ bāhucchāyāyāṃ vastum iti /
K01vinv07_u:71: bhavanto vaiśālīṃ saṃprasthito yeṣāṃ yuṣmākam abhirucitam ihāvasthānaṃ te (240v1 = GBM 6.793)
K01vinv07_u:72: 'bhitiṣṭhantu yeṣāṃ nābhirucitaṃ te sajjā bhavantu gacchāmaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:74: yūyaṃ gomahiṣīḥ yena vaiśālīṃ tena khaṭayata /
K01vinv07_u:77: tato janakāyam evaṃ prerayitvā rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati /
K01vinv07_u:82: sodyānaśobhāṃ kārayitvā sārādānaṃ śakaṭeṣv āropya upari khādanīyabhojanīyena ācchādya saṃprasthitaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:85: te tvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayanti /
K01vinv07_u:89: te caturaṅgaṃ balakāyaṃ sannāhya nirgatāḥ kathayanti /
K01vinv07_u:93: aho bata khaṇḍaḥ kālaṃ kuryān niṣpalāyeta iti vā iti /
K01vinv07_u:96: te rājñaś cittānurakṣayā kāṇḍakāṇḍiṃ kṛtvā nivṛttā rājñaḥ kathayanti /
K01vinv07_u:99: na śobhanam iti kṛtvā tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:101: tena khalu samayena vaiśālī tribhiḥ skandhaiḥ prativasati /
K01vinv07_u:102: prathame skandhe sapta kūṭāgārasahasrāṇi suvarṇamayair niryūhair madhyame skandhe
K01vinv07_u:103: caturdaśa rūpyamayair niryūhair adharime skandhe ekaviṃśatis tāmramayair niryūhais
K01vinv07_u:108: skandhe dārikā jāyate sā prathama eva skandhe dīyate na madhyame nādharime /
K01vinv07_u:109: yā madhyame sā prathame skandhe dīyate madhyame vā nādharime /
K01vinv07_u:110: yādharime sā triṣv api skandheṣu dīyate /
K01vinv07_u:114: khaṇḍasya pradhānapuruṣa iti kṛtvā prathame skandhe gṛhaṃ dattam* /
K01vinv07_u:116: yadā gaṇaḥ saṃnipatati tadāsāv āhūyamāno 'pi na saṃnipatati /
K01vinv07_u:120: saṃnipatitād eva ayam ādīnavaḥ prādurbhūto nāhaṃ saṃnipatāmīti /
K01vinv07_u:128: matam api nānuprayacchāmi yasmān matād eva me ādīnavāḥ prādurbhūtā iti /
K01vinv07_u:132: sa ca nigame saṃnipatati mataṃ cānuprayacchati /
K01vinv07_u:133: pūrvaṃ vaiśālakā licchavayo yasya kasyacil lekham anupreṣayanti sakarkaśam anupreṣayanti /
K01vinv07_u:134: yadā tu khaṇḍo mataṃ dātum ārabdhas tadā sānunayaṃ likhanti /
K01vinv07_u:138: bhavantaḥ ko yogo yena vaiśālako gaṇaḥ pūrvaṃ sakarkaśaṃ likhati idānīṃ tu sānunayam iti /
K01vinv07_u:141: videharājasya khaṇḍo nāmāgrāmātya ihāgatas tasya matenānuvyavaharanti yenādhunā sānunayaṃ likhantīti /
K01vinv07_u:142: khaṇḍena gopasya siṃhasya ca niveśanaṃ kṛtam* /
K01vinv07_u:143: siṃhasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato duhitā jātā /
K01vinv07_u:144: tasyāpi vistareṇa jātimahaṃ kṛtvā celeti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam* /
K01vinv07_u:145: sā naimittikena dṛṣṭvā vyākṛtā putraṃ janayiṣyati /
K01vinv07_u:146: sa pitaraṃ jīvitād vyaparopya svayam eva paṭṭaṃ baddhvā rājyaṃ kārayiṣyatīti /
K01vinv07_u:147: bhūyo 'sya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato duhitā jātā /
K01vinv07_u:148: tasya api vistareṇa jātimahaṃ kṛtvopaceleti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam* /
K01vinv07_u:149: sāpi naimittikena vyākṛtā putraṃ janayiṣyati lakṣaṇasaṃpūrṇam iti /
K01vinv07_u:150: gopo vyāḍo vikrānto vaiśālakānāṃ licchavīnām udyānāni vināśayati /
K01vinv07_u:156: putras te vaiśālakānāṃ licchavīnām udyānāni vināśayati /
K01vinv07_u:160: putra vaiśālakā licchavayo vyāḍā vikrāntā mā teṣām udyānāni vināśaya mā te anarthaṃ kariṣyantīti /
K01vinv07_u:162: tāta eṣām udyānāni santi asmākaṃ tu na santi /
K01vinv07_u:166: tena gaṇo vijñapto mama putrayor udyānaṃ nāsti /
K01vinv07_u:167: tad arhaṃ mama udyāne prasādaṃ kartum iti /
K01vinv07_u:172: tathā sthavirair api sūtrānte upanibaddhaṃ buddho bhagavān vaiśālyāṃ viharati gopasiṃhaśālavane iti /
K01vinv07_u:176: putra gaccha tvam amuka karvaṭaṃ tatra svādhiṣṭhitān karmāntān kāraya /
K01vinv07_u:178: sa tatra gatvā svādhiṣṭhitān karmāntān kārayitum ārabdhaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:179: yāvad apareṇa samayena vaiśālyāṃ senāpatiḥ kālagataḥ /
K01vinv07_u:181: so 'pi kaṃcit kālaṃ dharmeṇa senāpatyaṃ kārayitvā kālagataḥ /
K01vinv07_u:189: yady asau senāpatye sthāpyate niyataṃ gaṇasya bhedaṃ kariṣyati yas tu tasya bhrātā siṃhaḥ sa sūrataḥ (241v1 = GBM 6.795)
K01vinv07_u:191: yadi gaṇasyābhirucitaṃ taṃ senāpatiṃ sthāpayāma iti /
K01vinv07_u:196: mama (MSV II 10) jyeṣṭho bhrātā gopas taṃ senāpatiṃ sthāpayateti /
K01vinv07_u:198: siṃha na yuṣmākaṃ kulakramāgataṃ senāpatyaṃ yo gaṇasyābhirucitaḥ sa senāpatir bhavati /
K01vinv07_u:199: yadi bhavato nābhirucitaṃ vayam anyaṃ senāpatiṃ sthāpayāma iti /
K01vinv07_u:201: yady asmākaṃ gṛhāt senāpatyam anyatra gamiṣyati naitad yuktam* /
K01vinv07_u:204: sa tair mahatā satkāreṇa senāpatye pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:205: vaiśālakāḥ pūrvaṃ yasya lekham anupreṣayanti tasya khaṇḍapramukho gaṇa ājñāpayatīti likhanti /
K01vinv07_u:206: yadā siṃhaḥ senāpatiḥ saṃvṛttas tadā siṃhapramukho gaṇa ājñāpayatīti /
K01vinv07_u:207: yāvad apareṇa samayena yasmin karvaṭake gopaḥ svādhiṣṭhitān karmāntān kārayati tadā karvaṭakaṃ lekho gataḥ /
K01vinv07_u:210: bhavantaḥ pūrvaṃ vaiśālako gaṇaḥ khaṇḍapramukho gaṇa ājñāpayatīti likhanti /
K01vinv07_u:216: bhrātaḥ yuktaṃ nāma tava mayi jyeṣṭhatare tiṣṭhati senāpatyaṃ kartum iti /
K01vinv07_u:219: mama vaiśālakair asatkāraḥ prayukto gacchāmi rājagṛham iti /
K01vinv07_u:227: yāvad apareṇa samayena rājño bimbisārasyāgramahiṣī kālagatā /
K01vinv07_u:228: sa (MSV II 11) kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:230: deva kasyārthāya devaḥ kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthita iti /
K01vinv07_u:232: agramahiṣī me kālagatā kim iti na cintāparas tiṣṭhāmi /
K01vinv07_u:234: asti mama bhrātur duhitṛdvayaṃ rūpayauvanasaṃpannaṃ devārham eva /
K01vinv07_u:235: tatraikā vyākṛtā pitṛmārakaṃ putraṃ janayiṣyatīti dvitīyā tu lakṣaṇasaṃpannam iti /
K01vinv07_u:237: yā sā vyākṛtā lakṣaṇasaṃpannaṃ putraṃ janayiṣyatīti /
K01vinv07_u:239: rājño bimbisārasyāgramahiṣī kālagatā tvam upacelām iha preṣayāgramahiṣī bhaviṣyatīti /
K01vinv07_u:241: / dūram api param api gatvā tvam evāsmābhiḥ praṣṭavyaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:242: yad bhavatā kṛtaṃ tat paraṃ pramāṇam iti /
K01vinv07_u:243: tvam eva jānīṣe yathā gaṇena kriyākāraḥ kṛto nānyatra kanyā dātavyā ṛte vaiśālakān iti /
K01vinv07_u:244: kiṃ tu tvam āgatyodyāne tiṣṭha aham enām (242r1 = GBM 6.796)
K01vinv07_u:247: tato gopo rājānam avalokya ratham āruhya vaiśālīṃ saṃprasthitaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:250: tena khalu samayena vaiśālyāṃ dauvārikaḥ kālagato 'manuṣyakeṣūpapannaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:254: yadi kaścid vaiśālakānāṃ pratyarthikaḥ pratyamitra āgamiṣyati ahaṃ tāvad ghaṇṭāśabdaṃ kariṣyāmi yāvad gṛhīto vā niṣpalāyito veti /
K01vinv07_u:255: tair yakṣaḥ pratirūpaṃ kṛtvā ghaṇṭāṃ ca grīvāyāṃ baddhvā nṛtyagītavāditraśabdena balimālyopahāreṇa dvārakoṣṭhake pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:258: sa vaiśālakaṃ gaṇam avalokya gṛhaṃ gatvā upacelām āha /
K01vinv07_u:274: vaiśālako gaṇaḥ kṣubdhaḥ pratyamitro 'smākaṃ vaiśālīṃ praviṣṭa iti /
K01vinv07_u:275: siṃhaḥ saṃtrasta upaceleti kṛtvā celām ādāya laghu laghv nirgataḥ /
K01vinv07_u:276: gopo 'pi saṃtrastaḥ celāṃ rathe āropya saṃprasthitaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:279: sa paṃcasu sthāneṣu kṛtāvī tena paṃca licchaviśatāni marmaṇi tāḍitāni /
K01vinv07_u:281: bhavanto mayā yuṣmākaṃ paṃcaśatāni marmaṇi tāḍitāny avaśiṣṭaṃ jīvitenācchādayāmi nivartateti /
K01vinv07_u:282: te kathayanty ekasatvo 'py asmākaṃ na praghātitaḥ muṃcata sannāham* /
K01vinv07_u:284: paṃcaśatāni bhūmau nipatitāni prāṇaiś ca viyuktāni /
K01vinv07_u:285: tatas te puruṣarākṣaso 'yam iti kṛtvā bhītā niṣpalāyitāḥ /
K01vinv07_u:287: etad vairam asmābhir bhavanto bimbisāraputrāṇāṃ niryātayitavyam* /
K01vinv07_u:288: patralekhyaṃ kṛtvā peḍāyāṃ prakṣipya jatumudrātāpaṃ kṛtvā sthāpayateti /
K01vinv07_u:297: tato 'sau duḥkhī durmanā rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ /
K01vinv07_u:311: bhavanto yo hi putraḥ pitaraṃ ghātayati sa rājyahetoḥ /
K01vinv07_u:312: yadi me putro bhaviṣyati tasya jātasyaivāhaṃ paṭṭabandhaṃ kariṣyāmīti /
K01vinv07_u:316: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K01vinv07_u:317: yāvad apareṇa samayena rājā bimbisāro mṛgayā nirgataḥ /
K01vinv07_u:319: yāvan mṛgaḥ śaraparamparayā saṃtrāsitas tasya ṛṣer (MSV II 14)
K01vinv07_u:320: āśramapadān nirgato rājñā śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍitaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:323: tvayā tu śaraṇopagato mṛgaḥ praghātita iti /
K01vinv07_u:329: yo rājānaṃ paribhāṣate tasya ko daṇḍo deva /
K01vinv07_u:331: yady evaṃ parityakto me ayam ṛṣiḥ /
K01vinv07_u:334: yad aham anena kalirājena adūṣaṇam akāri badhyaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:338: yady aham anyatropapattiṃ grahiṣyāmīti kadācit pratyayaṃ nārāgayiṣyāmi /
K01vinv07_u:339: sarvathā anena me praṇidhānena asyaivāgramahiṣyāḥ kukṣāv upapattiḥ syād iti /
K01vinv07_u:340: sa mithyā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā celāyāḥ kukṣāv upapannaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:341: yam eva divasaṃ pratisandhir gṛhītas tam eva divasaṃ rudhiravarṣaṃ patitam* /
K01vinv07_u:343: aho batāhaṃ devasya pṛṣṭhamāṃsāny utpāṭyotpāṭya bhakṣayeyam iti /
K01vinv07_u:347: deva yo 'yaṃ satvo devyāḥ kukṣim avakrāntas tasyāyam anubhāva iti /
K01vinv07_u:351: deva tūlikāyāṃ māṃsapūrṇāṃ prāvṛtiṃ devyā ātmānam upanaya iti /
K01vinv07_u:352: tato rājñā māṃsapūrṇayā tūlikayā ātmānaṃ veṣṭayitvā celāyā upanāmitam* /
K01vinv07_u:354: tatas tasyā yo dohadaḥ sa prativigataḥ /
K01vinv07_u:356: aho batāhaṃ devasya rudhiraṃ pibeyam iti /
K01vinv07_u:358: tato rājñā paṃceṅkhikāḥ śirā mocayitvā rudhiraṃ pāyitā /
K01vinv07_u:362: yasminn api divase jātas tasminn api rudhiravarṣaṃ patitam* /
K01vinv07_u:363: bhūyo rājñā naimittikā āhūya pṛṣṭās te kathayanti /
K01vinv07_u:364: deva yathā śāstre dṛśyate niyatam ayaṃ dārakaḥ pitaraṃ jīvitād vyaparopya svayam eva paṭṭaṃ baddhvā rājyaṃ kārayiṣyatīti /
K01vinv07_u:366: / sarvathā rājyārtham ayaṃ māṃ jīvitād vyaparopayati /
K01vinv07_u:367: tad asmai svayam eva rājyaṃ dāsyāmi /
K01vinv07_u:369: tena khalu samayena vaiśālyāṃ mahānāmo licchaviḥ prativasati /
K01vinv07_u:371: tasminn apy akasmād eva kadalīskandho (MSV II 16) jātaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:380: śrutvā mahānāmo gṛhapatir bhūyasyā mātrayā vismayam āpannas tasmiṃś codyāne ārakṣakān puruṣān samantataḥ sthāpayitvā divasān gaṇayitum ārabdhaḥ
K01vinv07_u:381: yāvat saptame divase tasminn udyāne apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhallaṃ vyavasthāpite candanavāripariṣikte
K01vinv07_u:384: tasya tasmiṃś codyāne krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kadalīstambhaḥ sphuṭitaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:392: yāvan mahānāmo gṛhapatir udyānāt svagṛhaṃ gata āmrapālī dārikā unnīyate caryate pūrvavad yāvan mahatī saṃvṛttā /
K01vinv07_u:393: tasyā varā āgacchanti krauñcāḥ śākyāś cānye nānādeśanivāsino rājaputrāḥ /
K01vinv07_u:400: yasyaiva na dāsyāmi tasyaiva dviḍ bhaviṣyāmi /
K01vinv07_u:404: śṛṇvantu bhavanto brāhmaṇā gṛhapatayo mamodyāne dārikā utpannā /
K01vinv07_u:406: tām ahaṃ svakulavaṃśapratirūpakasya kasyacid bhāryārtham anuprayacchāmi /
K01vinv07_u:409: gṛhapate gaṇena pūrvam eva kriyākāraḥ kṛtaḥ kanyā anirvāhā strīratnaṃ gaṇabhogyam iti /
K01vinv07_u:413: tāṃ rūpayauvanasaṃpannāṃ dṛṣṭā sarva eva gaṇo vismayotphulladṛṣṭiḥ samantato nirīkṣitum ārabdhaḥ katayati ca /
K01vinv07_u:414: gṛhapate strīratnam etad gaṇabhogyaṃ na kasyacid deyam iti /
K01vinv07_u:415: tato mahānāmo gṛhapatir durmanāḥ svagṛhaṃ gataḥ /
K01vinv07_u:416: sa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:419: putri tvaṃ strīratnam iti kṛtvā gaṇabhogyā saṃvṛttā /
K01vinv07_u:422: putri gaṇena pūrvam eva kriyākāraḥ kṛtaḥ strīratnaṃ gaṇabhogyam iti /
K01vinv07_u:423: tvaṃ ca strīratnam ato 'ham anīśvara iti /
K01vinv07_u:425: samayo 'haṃ gaṇabhogyā bhavāmi yadi me gaṇaḥ (MSV II 18)
K01vinv07_u:429: yaś ca praviśati sa paṃcakārṣāpaṇaśatāny (243v1 = GBM 6.799) ādāya /
K01vinv07_u:430: yadā gṛhavicayo bhavati tadā mama gṛhaṃ saptame divase pratyavekṣyate /
K01vinv07_u:431: niṣkāsaḥ praveśaś ca madgṛhaṃ pravekṣyatāṃ na vicāryata iti /
K01vinv07_u:434: yat kathayati prathame skandhe gṛham iti /
K01vinv07_u:435: strīratnam asāv arhaty eva prathame skandhe gṛham* /
K01vinv07_u:436: yat kathayaty ekasmin praviṣṭe dvitīyena na praveṣṭavyam iti /
K01vinv07_u:439: yady ekasmin praviṣṭe dvitīyaḥ praviśati niyatam anyonyavipraghātiko bhaviṣyati /
K01vinv07_u:440: yat kathayati yaḥ praviśati tena paṃcakārṣāpaṇaśatāny ādāya praveṣṭavyam iti /
K01vinv07_u:443: yat kathayati saptame divase gṛhavicayaḥ kartavya ity etad api yuktam* /
K01vinv07_u:444: pūrvaṃ vā kriyeta paścād vā ko 'tra virodhaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:445: yat kathayati niṣkāsaḥ praveśo vā manuṣyāṇāṃ na vicāraṇīya ity etad api yuktam* /
K01vinv07_u:447: yadi puruṣāṇāṃ niṣkāsaḥ praveśo vā vicāryate kas tasyā gṛhaṃ pravekṣyati /
K01vinv07_u:448: tato gaṇena tasyāḥ paṃca varā dattāḥ /
K01vinv07_u:450: vaiśālakā licchavayas tasyā gṛhaṃ praveṣṭum ārabdhāḥ paricārayitum* /
K01vinv07_u:451: (MSV II 19) tatra keṣāṃcid uttaptaviṭatvāt sahadarśanād eva rāgo vigacchati /
K01vinv07_u:458: bhavanto yena yādṛśo rājā vā rājamātro vā dhanī vā śreṣṭhī vā vaṇig vā sārthavāho vā dṛṣṭaḥ sa tat tādṛśaṃ bhittau likhatv iti /
K01vinv07_u:460: tata āmrapālī nānālaṃkāravibhūṣitā citrakarma pratyavekṣate pṛcchati ca /
K01vinv07_u:469: evaṃ sarve tayā pṛṣṭās tair api sarvaiḥ samākhyātāḥ /
K01vinv07_u:470: tatas tasyā sarvān pratyavekṣya bimbisāre dṛṣṭir nipātitā /
K01vinv07_u:472: yādṛśo 'sya puruṣasyārohapariṇāhaḥ śakṣyaty eṣa mayā sārdhaṃ paricārayitum iti /
K01vinv07_u:473: yāvad apareṇa samayena rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāra upari prāsādatalagato 'mātyagaṇaparivṛtaḥ satkathayā tiṣṭhati /
K01vinv07_u:477: vaiśālyām āmrapālī nāma veśyā atīva rūpayauvanasaṃpannā catuḥṣaṣṭikalābhijñā devasyaivopabhogyā /
K01vinv07_u:479: gopaḥ yady evaṃ gacchāmo vaiśālīṃ tayā sārdhaṃ paricārayāmaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:481: devasya vaiśālakā licchavayo dīrgharātraṃ bādhakāḥ pratyarthinaḥ pratyamitrāḥ /
K01vinv07_u:488: sa ratham abhiruhya gopena sārdhaṃ vaiśālīṃ saṃprasthito 'nupūrveṇa vaiśālīṃ gataḥ /
K01vinv07_u:497: rājā bimbisāra āmrapālīṃ pṛcchati / bhadre kim
K01vinv07_u:504: saptāhaṃ tāvat krīḍa ramasva paricāraya saptāhasyātyayāt kālajñā bhaviṣyāmīti /
K01vinv07_u:505: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati yāvad āmrapālī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
K01vinv07_u:508: tena tasyā viralī aṅgulimudrā ca dattā /
K01vinv07_u:513: aṅgulimudrāṃ ca grīvāyāṃ baddhvā matsakāśaṃ preṣayasi /
K01vinv07_u:514: sa nirgatya gopena sārdhaṃ ratham abhiruhya saṃprasthitaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:518: paṃca licchaviśatāni baddhagodhāṅgulitrāṇāni rājño bimbisārasya pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhāni /
K01vinv07_u:530: bhavantaḥ sa evāyaṃ puruṣarākṣaso nivartāmaha iti /
K01vinv07_u:531: te pratinivṛttā vaiśālīṃ gatāḥ saṃnipatya punaḥ kriyākāraṃ kṛtāḥ /
K01vinv07_u:532: bhavanta etad api vairam asmābhir bimbisāraputrāṇāṃ niryātayitavyam iti /
K01vinv07_u:533: yāvan navānāṃ māsānām atyayād āmrapālī prasūtā /
K01vinv07_u:535: abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko yāvad unnītaś carito mahān saṃvṛttaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:536: sa vaiśālakair licchavidārakaiḥ sārdhaṃ krīḍaṃs tair apriyam uktaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:539: sa prarudan mātuḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntas tayocyate /
K01vinv07_u:543: putra yadi bhūyaḥ pṛcchanti vaktyavyās tādṛśo mama pitā yo yuṣmākam ekasyāpi nāstīti /
K01vinv07_u:547: yāvat sa tair sārdhaṃ bhūyaḥ krīḍitum ārabdhaḥ sa tais tathaivoktaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:549: tādṛśo me pitā yo yuṣmākam ekasyāpi nāstīti /
K01vinv07_u:560: saṃbahulāś ca vaṇijaḥ paṇyam ādāya rājagṛhaṃ saṃprasthitāḥ /
K01vinv07_u:561: tayā ta upalabdhā uktāś ca anenāṅgulimudreṇa bhāṇḍaṃ mudrayitvā gacchata /
K01vinv07_u:564: etad aṅgulimudrakaṃ grīvāyāṃ baddhā rājakuladvāre sthāpayiṣyatha /
K01vinv07_u:568: putra tvayā rājño 'rthādhikaraṇe niṣaṇṇasya muktāhāraṃ pādayoḥ sthāpayitvābhiruhyotsaṅge niṣattavyam* /
K01vinv07_u:569: yadi kaścit kathayati nāyaṃ dārako bibhetīti /
K01vinv07_u:572: sa vaṇigbhiḥ sārdham anupūrveṇa rājagṛhaṃ gataḥ /
K01vinv07_u:579: tāta asti kaścit putraḥ pitur bibhetīti /
K01vinv07_u:581: abhayo rājakumāro 'bhayo rājakumāra iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā /
K01vinv07_u:586: tena khalu samayena rājagṛhe 'nyataraḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahabhogī /
K01vinv07_u:590: bhadre gacchāmi paṇyam ādāya deśāntaram iti /
K01vinv07_u:594: rājā bimbisāro hastiskandhābhirūḍhas tasyā gṛhasamīpena gacchati /
K01vinv07_u:595: tayā ca vātāyanasthayā rājñaḥ sragdāmaṃ kṣiptam* /
K01vinv07_u:603: sā tasmin samaye kalyāṇī ṛtumatī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
K01vinv07_u:606: tato rājñā tasyāpi aṅgulimudrakañcitrā ca viralī dattā /
K01vinv07_u:609: etāṃ viralikāṃ prāvṛtya aṅgulimudrakaṃ ca grīvāyāṃ baddhvā mama preṣayiṣyasi /
K01vinv07_u:612: yāvad asau sārthavāhaḥ saṃpannārthe rājagṛhasamīpam āgataḥ /
K01vinv07_u:613: tena patnyādi saṃdiṣṭaṃ bhadre prāmodyam utpādaya /
K01vinv07_u:618: mayā evaṃ (245r1 = GBM 6.802) rūpam akṛtyaṃ kṛtaṃ sa cāgataḥ /
K01vinv07_u:623: ahaṃ tathā kariṣye yathā na śīghram āgamiṣyatīti /
K01vinv07_u:626: tena vinā tvayā iha na praveṣṭavyam iti /
K01vinv07_u:627: sa teṣāṃ ratnānām arthāya dūrataraṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:632: tayā peḍāyāṃ prakṣipya ghṛtasya madhunaś cāpyaṃ pūrayitvā aṃgulimudrakaṃ grīvāyāṃ baddhvā viralikayā pracchādya preṣyadārikā abhihitā /
K01vinv07_u:633: gaccha tvam etāṃ peḍāṃ rājakuladvāraṃ nītvā maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā pradīpaṃ prajvālya ekānte tiṣṭha yāvat kenacid gṛhīta iti /
K01vinv07_u:634: tayā yathākṛtaṃ yāvad rājā upari prāsādatalagato abhayena rājakumāreṇa sārdhaṃ tiṣṭhati /
K01vinv07_u:637: paśyata bhavantaḥ kim eṣa rājakuladvāre pradīpo jvalatīti /
K01vinv07_u:642: deva yad atra peḍāyāṃ tan mama dātum arhasīti /
K01vinv07_u:648: (MSV II 25) kim ayaṃ jīvaty āhosvin mṛta iti /
K01vinv07_u:650: tato rājñā aṃgulimudrakaṃ viralikāṃ ca pratyabhijñāya abhayāya sa rājakumārāya dattaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:652: rājñā jīvakavādena samudācarito 'bhayena ca rājakumāreṇa bhṛta iti jīvakaḥ kumārabhṛto jīvakaḥ kumārabhṛta iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā /
K01vinv07_u:653: yāvad apareṇa samayena jīvakaḥ kumārabhṛto mahān saṃvṛttaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:656: vayam api kiṃcic chilpaṃ śikṣāmahe yad asmākam uttarakālaṃ jīvikā bhaviṣyatīti /
K01vinv07_u:658: rathakāraś ca śuklavāsāḥ śuklavāsobhiḥ puruṣaiḥ parivṛto rājakulaṃ praviśati /
K01vinv07_u:659: so 'bhayena rājakumāreṇa dṛṣṭas tenānye ca rājapuruṣāḥ pṛṣṭāḥ ka eṣa iti /
K01vinv07_u:667: deva aham api rathakāratvaṃ śikṣe iti /
K01vinv07_u:673: jīvakenāpi vaidyo dṛṣṭaḥ śuklavāsāḥ śuklavāsobhiḥ puruṣaiḥ parivṛto rājakulaṃ praviśan /
K01vinv07_u:674: tenāpare ca pṛṣṭāḥ ka eṣa iti /
K01vinv07_u:680: (MSV II 26) atha preto na mārgyo na pṛcchyaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:690: sa kapālīmocanīṃ tu vidyāṃ na jānāti /
K01vinv07_u:691: tena śrutaṃ takṣaśilāyām ātreyo nāma vaidyarājaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:704: eṣa mama putro vaidyakaṃ śikṣitum ātreyasya sakāśaṃ gacchaty asya sarvayogodvahanaṃ kartavyam iti /
K01vinv07_u:706: puṣkarasāriṇā ca lekhaṃ vācayitvā ātreyasya samarpitaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:707: eṣa rājaputras tvatsakāśam upetyāgato vaidyakam enaṃ śikṣayasveti /
K01vinv07_u:709: so 'lpataram upadiśati jīvakaḥ saviśeṣaṃ gṛhṇāty ācarati /
K01vinv07_u:710: ātreyasya yadā glānāvalokako gacchati tadā ekam ādāya gacchati /
K01vinv07_u:722: sa ātreyeṇa sārdhaṃ niṣkramya punaḥ praviṣṭaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:725: yan mayā bhaiṣajyaṃ vyupadiṣṭaṃ tan na deyam idaṃ cedaṃ ca deyam iti /
K01vinv07_u:728: yāvad aparasmin divase punar apy ātreyasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ /
K01vinv07_u:731: evaṃ punar apy etad eva deyam* /
K01vinv07_u:732: tat kiṃ yat pūrvam ādiṣṭam* āhosvit paścāt* /
K01vinv07_u:733: kiṃ mayā pūrvam ādiṣṭaṃ kiṃ vā paścāt* /
K01vinv07_u:734: taiḥ samākhyātam idaṃ tvayā sākṣād vyupadiṣṭaṃ idaṃ jīvakena saṃdiṣṭam iti /
K01vinv07_u:736: ham* jīvakaḥ prājña iti viditvā kathayati yad jīvakena vyupadiṣṭaṃ tad dātavyam iti /
K01vinv07_u:738: sa yatra gacchati tatra jīvakam ādāya /
K01vinv07_u:739: te 'nye māṇavakāḥ kathayanty upādhyāya tvam asya rājaputra iti kṛtvā yatnato (246r1 = GBM 6.804)
K01vinv07_u:747: tena te māṇavakāḥ sarve vīthīṃ preṣitās tvayāmukasya dravyasya mūlyaṃ praṣṭavyaṃ tvayāmukasyeti /
K01vinv07_u:751: yady upādhyāyo 'nyasya dravyasya mūlyaṃ prakṣyati kiṃ mayā vaktavyam* /
K01vinv07_u:753: te sarve upādhyāyasakāśam āgatya yathāsaṃdiṣṭaṃ niveditavantaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:755: māṇavaka amukasya dravyasya kiṃ mūlyam iti /
K01vinv07_u:765: ity artham ahaṃ kathayāmīti jīvakaḥ prājño 'ham alpaṃ vyapadiśāmy ayaṃ svaśaktyā vibhajatīti /
K01vinv07_u:767: te tenoktā gacchata saralakaṃ parvatam abhaiṣajyam ānayateti /
K01vinv07_u:768: te gatās teṣāṃ yad yad abhaiṣajyam abhirucitaṃ tat tena gṛhītam* /
K01vinv07_u:772: yāvajjīvakenārdhapathe gopāṃganā dṛṣṭā dadhighaṭakiṭālapiṇḍaṃ cādāyātreyasakāśaṃ saṃprasthitātīvākṣirogārtā /
K01vinv07_u:776: tena tasyās tasminn eva sthāne saṃnihitabhaiṣajyaṃ vyupadiṣṭam* /
K01vinv07_u:780: tena kiṭālapiṇḍako gṛhīto dadhighaṭas tu tayā eva dattaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:782: yāvat tair māṇavakair antarmārge hastipadaṃ dṛṣṭam* /
K01vinv07_u:797: māṇavakāḥ sarvam etad bhaiṣajyam etan tāvad udakenaivaṃ vidhināmukasya rogasya /
K01vinv07_u:801: sa kathayaty upādhyāya sarvam eva bhaiṣajyaṃ nāsti kiñcid abhaiṣajyam* /
K01vinv07_u:802: api tu mayā śaramūlam ānītaṃ pāṣāṇavartikā kiṭālapiṇḍaś ceti /
K01vinv07_u:809: te kathayanty upādhyāya kim etad eva /
K01vinv07_u:824: katham etad* jñāyate hastipadaṃ hastinyāḥ padam iti /
K01vinv07_u:825: sa kathayaty upādhyāya vayaṃ rājakule saṃvṛddhāḥ (246v1 = GBM 6.805)
K01vinv07_u:844: api tu yady upādhyāyasya vimarṣaḥ sa sārtho 'muṣmin pradeśe tatra kañcin māṇavaṃ preṣaya /
K01vinv07_u:851: jīvakena sarvaṃ śikṣitaṃ sthāpayitvā kapālamocanīṃ vidyām* /
K01vinv07_u:852: yāvad anyatamaḥ puruṣaḥ kapālavyādhinā spṛṣṭa ātreyasakāśaṃ gataḥ kathayaty ātreya mama cikitsāṃ kuru /
K01vinv07_u:854: bhoḥ puruṣa adya tāvad gartāṃ khānaya gomayaṃ ca samupānaya /
K01vinv07_u:858: bhoḥ (MSV II 31) puruṣa yat kiṃcid ahaṃ śikṣe sarvaṃ tat satvahitahetoḥ /
K01vinv07_u:860: sa tvaṃ samprati gupte sthāpaya yathā tava karma kriyamāṇaṃ paśyāmīti /
K01vinv07_u:864: tata ātreyeṇāgatya sa puruṣo gartāyāṃ nikhātaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:866: sa taṃ prāṇakaṃ saṃdaṃśena grahītum ārabdhaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:867: jīvakaḥ kathayaty upādhyāya mā sāhasaṃ kariṣyasi /
K01vinv07_u:880: jīvaka parituṣṭo 'haṃ snātvāgaccha kapālamocanīṃ vidyāṃ dāsyāmīti /
K01vinv07_u:884: jīvakāsmākaṃ jīvikaiṣā na tvayeha viṣaye prayoktavyā /
K01vinv07_u:886: jīvaka ātreyam upāmaṃtrya puṣkarasāriṇo rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatvopāmaṃtrayati /
K01vinv07_u:889: tena khalu samayena puṣkarasāriṇo rājñaḥ pāṇḍavā nāma khaṣā viruddhāḥ /
K01vinv07_u:891: jīvaka mama pāṇḍavā nāma khaṣā viruddhāṃs tāvat saṃnāmaya paścād yāsyasi /
K01vinv07_u:895: tatas tena caturaṃgaṃ balakāyaṃ datvā preṣitaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:899: tena parituṣṭena tasyaivānumoditam* tenāpi ātreyāya dattam* /
K01vinv07_u:902: tatra tena sarvabhūtarutaṃ nāma śāstraṃ śikṣitam* /
K01vinv07_u:904: (247r1 = GBM 6.806) anyatamaś ca puruṣaḥ kāṣṭhabhāram ādāya nagaraṃ praviśaty asthicarmāvaśeṣaḥ samantād gātreṇādharataḥ /
K01vinv07_u:906: bhoḥ puruṣa kena te īdṛśī samavasthā iti /
K01vinv07_u:907: sa kathayaty aham api na jāne /
K01vinv07_u:908: api tu mayā caiṣa cāṣṭhabhārako gṛhīto bhavati /
K01vinv07_u:912: bhoḥ puruṣa kim ayaṃ kāṣṭhabhārako vikrīyate /
K01vinv07_u:917: tataḥ pratyavekṣatā sarvabhūtaprasādano nāma maṇir dṛṣṭaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:918: tasyedṛśaḥ prabhāvo yadā vyādhitasya purastāt sthāpyate tadā vyādhir yathābhūtā ca dṛśyate pradīpeṇeva gṛhagataṃ dravyam* /
K01vinv07_u:922: sa droṇaṃ māpayitvāḍhakena śirasi prahāraṃ dadāti /
K01vinv07_u:923: jīvakena dṛṣṭaḥ uktaś ca bhoḥ puruṣa kimartham eva karoṣi /
K01vinv07_u:927: tato jīvakena sarvabhūtaprasādako maṇis tasya śirasi sthāpito yāvat paśyati śatapadīm* /
K01vinv07_u:929: bhoḥ puruṣa tava śirasi śatapadī tiṣṭhatīti /
K01vinv07_u:930: sa pādayor nipatya kathayati cikitsāṃ me kuruṣveti /
K01vinv07_u:935: bhoḥ puruṣādya gartaṃ khānaya pāṣiṃ ca samupānaya cikitsāṃ kariṣyāmīti /
K01vinv07_u:937: jīvakenāpy aparasmin divase sa puruṣo garte nikhāte nikhātya kapālamocanyā vidyayā kapālaṃ mocayitvā saptena saṃdaṃśena śatapadī spṛṣṭā /
K01vinv07_u:945: sa tatrātivādhyavasitaḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā tasminn evāmanuṣyakeṣūpapannaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:947: tena tasminn udyāne ārakṣakaḥ puruṣaḥ sthāpitaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:953: yāvad anyatara udarī manuṣyaḥ sarvavaidyapratyākhyātas tad udyānaṃ gatvā rātriṃ vāsam upagataḥ /
K01vinv07_u:955: tasminn eva ca jīvako rātriṃ vāsam upagataḥ /
K01vinv07_u:956: yāvad asāv amanuṣyakas tam udariṇam abhidravitum ārabdhaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:960: nāsti te kaścit* chāgasaṭāyā dhūpaṃ dātā yena tvaṃ dvādaśa yojanāni niṣpalāyer iti /
K01vinv07_u:962: tavāpi nāsti kaścin mūlakabījam udaśvinā piṣṭā dātā yena tvaṃ khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ viśīryethā iti /
K01vinv07_u:964: sa kalyam evotthāya tasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ /
K01vinv07_u:965: kathayati gṛhapate udyānaṃ puṣpaphalasalilasaṃpannaṃ kimartham utsṛṣṭam iti /
K01vinv07_u:972: tenāpi gṛhapatinā paṃca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni jīvakāya dattāni /
K01vinv07_u:975: bhoḥ puruṣa kimarthaṃ tvam atrāmanuṣyakādhyuṣite udyāne tiṣṭhasīti /
K01vinv07_u:982: tenāpi puruṣeṇa paṃca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni jīvakāya dattāni /
K01vinv07_u:989: tasmiṃś ca vṛkṣe vṛdhriṇī sapotakā tiṣṭhati /
K01vinv07_u:995: amba eṣa mallo mallena nihataḥ kālagato nīyate /

K01vinv07_u:2216: pṛthagbhavanti rājakṛtyāni rājakaraṇīyāni tāny ahaṃ kṛtvā pariprāpya etarhy āgacchāmi rajasāvacūrṇitagātraḥ /
K01vinv07_u:2217: tena hi mahārāja tvām eva prakṣyāmi /

K01vinv07_u:2224: yāvac ca nabho 'trāntare sarvān satvān sarvān prāṇinaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni sarvaṃ ca
K01vinv07_u:2228: yat te deva kṛtyaṃ vā karaṇīyaṃ vā tat kuruṣveti /

K01vinv07_u:2230: pūrvavad yat kṛtyaṃ vā karaṇīyaṃ vā tat kuruṣveti /
K01vinv07_u:2231: evaṃ bhūpate mahārāja mahati mahābhaye pratyupasthite dāruṇe puruṣasaṃkṣaye durlabhe manuṣyapratilaṃbhe kiṃ syāt karaṇīyam* /
K01vinv07_u:2232: evaṃ rūpe me bhadanta mahati mahābhaye pratyupasthite dāruṇe puruṣasaṃkṣaye durlabhe

K01vinv07_u:2234: kuśalacaryāyāṃ kalyāṇacaryāyāṃ buddhānāṃ ca śāsane yogam āpattum* /
K01vinv07_u:2236: evaṃ rūpe me mahati mahābhaye pūrvavad yāvad buddhānāṃ śāsane yogam āpattum iti /
K01vinv07_u:2237: yāni tāni bhadanta rājñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktānāṃ janapadaiś caryasthāmavīryam
K01vinv07_u:2238: anuprāptānāṃ mahāntaṃ pṛthivīmaṇḍalam abhinirjityādhyāvasatāṃ pṛthagbhavanti hastibhir
K01vinv07_u:2239: hastiyuddhāny aśvair aśvayuddhāni rathai rathayuddhāni pattibhiḥ pattiyuddhāni mantrair
K01vinv07_u:2241: tāni teṣāṃ tasmin samaye asthāmāny abalāny aparākramāṇi yuddhāya /

K01vinv07_u:2248: yathā mahānto vipulā nabha āsādya parvatāḥ
K01vinv07_u:2250: na tatra hastināṃ bhūmir na pattirathavājinām*
K01vinv07_u:2251: na cāpi mantrayuddhena jayo labhyo dhanena vā //
K01vinv07_u:2252: evaṃ jarā ca mṛtyuś ca manuṣyān abhimardati /

K01vinv07_u:2257: tasmād dhi paṇḍitaḥ poṣaḥ saṃpaśyann artham ātmanaḥ /

K01vinv07_u:2262: atha rājā prasenajit kosalo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:2265: kiṃ bhadanta viśākhayā mṛgāramātrā karma kṛtam* /

K01vinv07_u:2270: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamo gṛhapatiputraḥ kālagataḥ /
K01vinv07_u:2272: yadā bhagavān kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupādhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:2273: tasmiṃś ca samaye vārāṇasyāṃ kṛkir nāma rājā babhūva /
K01vinv07_u:2274: tena bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya catūratnamayastūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:2275: tatra yā sā aputrā yuvatiḥ putrābhinandinī sā vṛddhā saṃvṛttā /
K01vinv07_u:2277: tayā chandakabhikṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā tasmin stūpe pūjā kṛtā praṇidhānaṃ ca /
K01vinv07_u:2278: yan mayā bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya satkārāḥ kṛtāḥ /
K01vinv07_u:2279: anena mama kuśalamūlena bahavaḥ putrā bhaveyur iti kṛtvā prakrāntā nagaraṃ praviṣṭā /
K01vinv07_u:2285: (MSV II 78) yady ahaṃ prasūtā bhaveyam aham apy evaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhaveyam* /
K01vinv07_u:2286: yāvat punar api dvātriṃśatā goṣṭhikais tasmin stūpe pūjā kṛtā /
K01vinv07_u:2292: te kathayanti amba idaṃ cedaṃ ca /
K01vinv07_u:2294: putrāḥ yady evam aham eva yuṣmākaṃ mātā bhaveyam* /
K01vinv07_u:2299: sā tāvat strī ekavāraṃ prasūyamānā duḥkhavedanābhyāhatā tathā virauti ahaṃ punar dvātriṃśad vārān prasūyamānā kathaṃ kariṣyāmi iti /
K01vinv07_u:2302: sā muhūrtamātreṇa dvātriṃśadaṇḍāni prasutā na ca virauti /

K01vinv07_u:2305: kartum ārabdhā yatheyaṃ kukkuṭī muhūrtamātreṇa dvātriṃśadaṇḍāni prasūtā evam eva
K01vinv07_u:2308: yā sā vṛddhā yuvatir eṣaiva sā viśākhā /
K01vinv07_u:2309: tena kālena tena samayena ye te dvātriṃśad goṣṭhikā eta eva te dvātriṃśad viśākhāputrāḥ /
K01vinv07_u:2310: yad anayā tatra praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena dvātriṃśadaṇḍāni prasūtāni /
K01vinv07_u:2311: kiṃ bhadanta viśākhāputraiḥ karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena adūṣyanapakāriṇo rājñā prasenajitā praghātitāḥ /
K01vinv07_u:2315: ebhir eva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām* /
K01vinv07_u:2318: caurā madyaṃ paryeṣamāṇāḥ tasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāntāḥ /
K01vinv07_u:2331: yad ahaṃ ghātye tat sarvam anayā śauṇḍikapatnyā /
K01vinv07_u:2332: tatropapadye 'haṃ yatraiṣāṃ śirāṃsi chitvā peḍāyāṃ pūrayitvā etasyāṃ preṣayeyam iti /
K01vinv07_u:2334: yo 'sau vṛṣa eṣa evāsau rājā prasenajit kosalaḥ tena kālena tena samayena /
K01vinv07_u:2335: ye te caurā eta eva te viśākhāputrāḥ /

K01vinv07_u:2337: buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe /
K01vinv07_u:2338: tena khalu samayena pañcābhijñasya ṛṣer āśramapadam* /
K01vinv07_u:2339: tena tasmin paryaṭatā āśramapadasya nātidūre ciraṃkhale bhūpradeśe prasrāvaḥ kṛtaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:2340: daivayogāt tṛṣārtā mṛgī taṃ pradeśam anuprāptā /
K01vinv07_u:2345: yāvad apareṇa samayena tasminn eva pradeśe āgatya prasūtā /
K01vinv07_u:2347: sā taṃ ghrātvā visabhāgasatva iti chorayitvā prakrāntā /
K01vinv07_u:2348: yāvat tena ṛṣiṇā tad āśramaṃ paryaṭatā sa dārako dṛṣṭaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:2349: sa samanvāhartuṃ pravṛttaḥ kasyāyaṃ putra iti /
K01vinv07_u:2351: tenāsau āśramapadaṃ praveśita āpāyitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:2352: tasya mṛgasya yādṛśaṃ śira iti mṛgaśiro mṛgaśira iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā /
K01vinv07_u:2356: yadi tāvat khaṃkhaṭasvaro bhavati ūrdhvagāmī bhavati devopapattiṃ vyākaroti /
K01vinv07_u:2357: atha madhyo bhavati ūrdhvagāmī bhavati manuṣyopapattiṃ vyākaroti /
K01vinv07_u:2360: yadi tāvad gadgadasvaro bhavati adhogāmī bhavati narakopapattiṃ vyākaroti /
K01vinv07_u:2361: atha madhyasvaro bhavati adhogāmī bhavati tiryagupapattiṃ /
K01vinv07_u:2363: tato bhagavatā tasya vinayakālaṃ jñātvā āyuṣmān ānanda uktaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:2364: gacchānanda catvāri śirāṃsy ādhāya srotaāpannasya sakṛdāgāmino 'nāgāmino 'rhataś ceti /
K01vinv07_u:2365: evaṃ bhadantety ayuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:2366: catvāri śirāṃsy ādhāya tasya ṛṣeḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ /
K01vinv07_u:2368: sa srotaāpannasyeti kapālam ākoṭya kathayaty ayaṃ deveṣūpapannaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:2372: ākotya viṣayaṃ na jānāti na vijānāti /
K01vinv07_u:2374: bhraṣṭo 'smi tasmād upadeśataḥ kiṃ athavā na cāryakule prasūtaḥ /

K01vinv07_u:2377: na sarvavidyāsu kṛtaśramas tvaṃ yenāsya jānāsi taṃ hi pracāram* /
K01vinv07_u:2378: adhīṣva tāvan nikhilāṃ vidyāṃ lokasya paścād vyapadekṣyasi tvam iti /
K01vinv07_u:2380: asti kaścit tvayā sarvavidyāsu kṛtāvī dṛṣṭaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:2387: śiṣṭaṃ nopalabhe ca satvacaritaṃ vidyāparādhe sati /
K01vinv07_u:2389: kiṃ tat sarvaparapravādivijaya śiṣṭaṃ na vijñāyate // iti //
K01vinv07_u:2392: anupūrvopaśāntasya yathā na jñāyate gatiḥ /{cf. Uv 30.35}
K01vinv07_u:2395: prajñaptaṃ vā gatir nāsti prāptānām acalaṃ padam* // iti //
K01vinv07_u:2396: evam ukte mṛgaśirā bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv07_u:2397: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ careyam ahaṃ bhagavato 'ntike brahmacaryam iti /
K01vinv07_u:2399: pravrājyopasaṃpādya yathābhiramyaṃ rājagṛhe vihṛtya yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:2403: dṛṣṭvā ca punar āyuṣmantaṃ mṛgaśirasam āmantrayate /
K01vinv07_u:2404: samanvāhara mṛgaśiraḥ kiyac cireṇa devo varṣiṣyatīti /
K01vinv07_u:2418: tatra ye snāsyanti teṣām utpādagaṇḍapiṭakāni na (MSV II 83)
K01vinv07_u:2420: iti hi mṛgaśiro nakṣatrāṇi capalāni caṃcalāny anavasthāyīni /
K01vinv07_u:2421: jīvitam api caṃcalam anavasthitam ity evam uktaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:2425: gatir mṛgāṇāṃ pavanam ākāśaṃ pakṣiṇāṃ gatiḥ /
K01vinv07_u:2426: gatir virāgiṇāṃ dharmo nirvāṇaṃ gatir arhatām* // iti //
K01vinv07_u:2427: aśrauṣīd viśākhā mṛgāramātā bhagavān kosaleṣu janpadeṣu cārikāṃ caran śrāvastīm anuprāptaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharaty asmākam evārāma iti /
K01vinv07_u:2428: śrutvā ca punar yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā /
K01vinv07_u:2429: (258v1 = GBM 6.829) upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇā /
K01vinv07_u:2430: ekāntaniṣaṇṇāṃ viśākhāṃ mṛgāramātaraṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati pūrvavad yāvat saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm* /
K01vinv07_u:2431: atha viśākhā mṛgāramātā utthāyāsanād yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat* /
K01vinv07_u:2432: adhivāsayatu me bhagavāṃ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgheneti /

K01vinv07_u:2435: yāvad asau preṣyadārikā pūrvārāmaṃ gatvā paśyati bhikṣūn kavāṭavivareṇa nagnān snāyinaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:2437: nūnam āryakāḥ prakrāntāḥ ebhiḥ putramoṭikāputrair ājīvikair ayaṃ vihāro 'vaṣṭabdha iti /
K01vinv07_u:2439: yat khalv ārye jānīyā āryāḥ prakrāntāḥ /
K01vinv07_u:2442: asthānam anavakāśo yad bhagavān adhivāsyābhuktvā prakramiṣyati /
K01vinv07_u:2443: nūnam anayā bhikṣavo vinagnā dṛṣṭā iti /
K01vinv07_u:2445: samayo bhadanta sajjaṃ bhaktaṃ yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti pūrvavad yāvad bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastam apanītapātram* /
K01vinv07_u:2447: icchāmy ahaṃ bhadanta aṣṭau mahādānāni prajñāpayitum* /
K01vinv07_u:2448: āgantuke dānaṃ gamike dānaṃ glāne dānaṃ glānopasthāyike dānaṃ dhruvaṃ yavāguṃ dhruvaṃ bhaiṣajyaṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ varṣāśāṭīcīvaraṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ codakaśāṭikām iti /
K01vinv07_u:2450: kiṃ punas tad viśākhe ānuśaṃsaṃ samanupaśyantī āgantuke dānaṃ dadāsi /
K01vinv07_u:2451: āgantuko bhadanta bhikṣur na gocarakuśalo bhavati na vīthīkuśalaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:2452: sa madīyaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya gocarakuśalo bhaviṣyati /
K01vinv07_u:2456: gamiko bhadanta bhikṣuḥ piṇḍapātaṃ paryeṣamāṇaḥ sārthāt paribhṛśyate /
K01vinv07_u:2458: sa madīyaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya sārthān na paribhṛśyate /
K01vinv07_u:2460: sādhu sādhu viśākhe etad api gatam* /
K01vinv07_u:2463: paryeṣamāṇaḥ klāmed vā kālaṃ vā kuryāt* /

K01vinv07_u:3936: āyuṣman yady apy evaṃ yathāpi yāvac chīlavān puruṣapudgalaś ciraṃ jīvati tāvad bahupuṇyaṃ prasūyate /
K01vinv07_u:3937: yāvad bahupuṇyaṃ prasūyate tāvac ciraṃ svargeṣu modate /
K01vinv07_u:3944: ārya yādṛśa evāyaṃ tava rogas tādṛśa eva rājña putrasya /
K01vinv07_u:3947: yady apy etat te maṇḍam api (MSV II 136)
K01vinv07_u:3948: bhāgyaviśeṣāt pratilabhyase tena te yāpyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
K01vinv07_u:3953: yadā yācanako dvāre tiṣṭhati tadāsau rauti /
K01vinv07_u:3954: yāvad asau ghaṇṭā pratyekabuddham āgataṃ nivedayantī raṭitum ārabdhā /
K01vinv07_u:3959: putra asmābhir dvādaśabhir varṣair dravyasaṃhāraṃ kṛtvā idaṃ ghṛtaṃ pakvam* /
K01vinv07_u:3962: tasya kṛtakutūhalasvastyayanasya ghṛtaṃ pātukāmasya yācanakabhājanāśāmarmasaṃghaṭṭitaśarīrasya tad vṛttaṃ na rocate /
K01vinv07_u:3964: amba tāta na tāvaparibhokṣye yāvad yācanakaḥ praviśata iti /
K01vinv07_u:3980: tenāpi mahātmanā sarvasatvahitānugataṃ rājaputreṇa cittam utpāditam* /
K01vinv07_u:3984: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau rājakumāraḥ (MSV II 137)
K01vinv07_u:3985: aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena /
K01vinv07_u:3986: tadāpi me glānakāḥ priyāḥ prāg evedānīm* /
K01vinv07_u:3987: kiṃ bhadanta tena rājaputreṇa tena ca pratyekabuddhena karma kṛtaṃ yena tayor yugapad vyādhir utpanno yugapac ca vyupaśāntir iti /
K01vinv07_u:3989: tasyām eva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāni avaśyaṃbhāvīni
K01vinv07_u:3990: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante /
K01vinv07_u:3994: bhūdhātuṣv eva skandhadhātv āyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca /
K01vinv07_u:3995: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi api kalpaśatair api /
K01vinv07_u:3996: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
K01vinv07_u:3997: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā babhūva /
K01vinv07_u:4001: tayor api kanīyān sa paurohityaṃ prārthayate /
K01vinv07_u:4002: dhātuśaḥ satvāḥ saṃsyandanta iti tayoḥ parasparaṃ sakhyam utpannam* /
K01vinv07_u:4004: ka upāyaḥ syād yenāhaṃ rājā bhaveyam* /
K01vinv07_u:4007: yadi tvaṃ māṃ paurohitye sthāpayasi (MSV II 138)
K01vinv07_u:4017: tatas tena tasya jyeṣṭhasya rājaputrasya bhaiṣajyaṃ dattam* /
K01vinv07_u:4020: amātyaiḥ sa vyaṃga iti kṛtvā kanīyān rājye 'bhiṣiktaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:4021: tenāpy asau kanīyān purohitaputraḥ paurohitye pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:4022: yāvad apareṇa samayena rājā purohitena sārdhaṃ saṃlāpena tiṣṭhati /
K01vinv07_u:4025: na śobhanaṃ mayā kṛtaṃ yad rājyahetor bhrātā vyaṃgīkṛta iti /
K01vinv07_u:4028: yadi devasyābhimataṃ punar apy evaṃ yathāpaurāṇaṃ karomīti /
K01vinv07_u:4033: tatas tau pratyekabuddhe kārān kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhau /
K01vinv07_u:4034: yadāvābhyām evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kārāḥ kṛtā asya karmaṇo vipākena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeyahi /
K01vinv07_u:4035: asya ca pāpasya vyaṃgīkaraṇasya karmaṇo vipākam anubhaveyam iti (273v1 = GBM 6.859) /
K01vinv07_u:4037: yo 'sau rājaputraḥ aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena /
K01vinv07_u:4039: yat tābhyāṃ saṃjalpaṃ kṛtvā rājakumārasya bhaiṣajyaṃ dattaṃ tena yugapad vyaṃgau saṃvṛttau /
K01vinv07_u:4040: yat tu vipratisārābhyāṃ vicārya punar bhaiṣajyaṃ dattaṃ tena yugapat svasthībhūtau /
K01vinv07_u:4041: iti hi (MSV II 139) bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:4044: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasvābhogāḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:4047: tena khalu samayena śrāvastyāṃ śreṣṭhināmā gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhane mahābhoge vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī
K01vinv07_u:4049: so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīn anyāṃś ca devatāviśeṣān āyācate /
K01vinv07_u:4050: tadyathā ārāmadevatā vanadevatāś catvaradevatāḥ śṛṃgāṭakadevatā balipratigrāhikā devatāḥ sahajāḥ sahadharmikā nityānubaddhā api devatā āyācate
K01vinv07_u:4054: yady evam abhaviṣyad ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakaravartinaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:4055: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
K01vinv07_u:4061: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
K01vinv07_u:4062: yadāsya devatārādhanenāpi na putro na duhitā tadā sarvadevatāḥ pratyākhyāya bhagavaty abhiprasannaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:4067: sa tasyānupūrvyā keśāvataraṇaṃ kṛtvā śikṣāpadāni grāhayitum ārabdhaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:4072: na tāvac chikṣāpadāni deyāni yāvat svasthaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:4074: tasyopasthānaṃ kartavyam iti hi bhikṣavo na jānante kena kartavyam iti /
K01vinv07_u:4080: ārya vayam asya divā cikitsikāṃ kurmaḥ rātrau glānyaṃ vardhate /
K01vinv07_u:4081: yady eṣa gṛhaṃ nīyate vayam asya rātrau cikitsāṃ kuryāma iti /
K01vinv07_u:4087: tasya muṇḍo gṛhapatir iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā /
K01vinv07_u:4088: sa yadā mūlagaṇḍapatrapuṣpaphalabhaiṣajyair upasthīyamāno na svasthībhavati tadā tenātmā paricchinno mṛto 'ham iti /
K01vinv07_u:4089: tatas tena maraṇakālasamaye sarvaṃ santakasvāpateyaṃ patrābhilekhyaṃ kṛtvā jetavane preṣitam* /
K01vinv07_u:4093: prabhūtaṃ cāsya hiraṇyasuvarṇam asti hastino 'śvā gāvo mahiṣyaḥ sannāhāni ca /
K01vinv07_u:4094: etac ca sarvaṃ patrābhilikhitaṃ kṛtvā jetanavanam āryasaṃghāya preṣitam* /
K01vinv07_u:4097: na pratilabdhaṃ prāg eva patrābhilikhitaṃ pratilapsye /
K01vinv07_u:4098: api tu yad bhagavān anujñāsyati tad grahīṣye /
K01vinv07_u:4105: dvipadā catuṣpadā yāvat* annapānaṃ ca bhaiṣajyam* /
K01vinv07_u:4106: dāso vā prastaraṃ lekhyaṃ yathāyogena bhājayet* //
K01vinv07_u:4107: hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca yac cāpy anyat kṛtākṛtam* /
K01vinv07_u:4108: samagraḥ saṃgho bhājayed iti proktaṃ maharṣiṇā //
K01vinv07_u:4117: śāṭakāḥ paṭakā carmabhāṇḍam upānahas tailakutupāḥ kuṇḍikākarakāś (MSV II 142)
K01vinv07_u:4119: yaṣṭayo yā āyatās tā jambūcchāyikāḥ pratimāyā dhvajavaṃśāḥ kārayitavyāḥ /
K01vinv07_u:4120: yāḥ svalpās tāḥ khaṃkharakāḥ kṛtvā bhikṣūṇāṃ dātavyāḥ /
K01vinv07_u:4121: putradārakaṃ saṃghena yathāsukham avikrīya yathābhiprasādalabdhena moktavyāḥ /
K01vinv07_u:4122: catuṣpadānāṃ hastino 'śvā uṣṭrāḥ kharā vesarāś ca rājña upayogāḥ /
K01vinv07_u:4123: mahiṣyaḥ ajā eḍakāś cāturdiśāya bhikṣusaṃghāya (274v1 = GBM 6.861)
K01vinv07_u:4125: yaś ca sannāho yac cānyatra rājopayojyaṃ tat sarvaṃ rājña upanāmayitavyam* /
K01vinv07_u:4126: sthāpayitvāyudhāni taiḥ śastrakaiḥ sūcyaḥ khaṃkharakāś ca kārayitvā saṃghe cārayitavyāḥ /
K01vinv07_u:4127: raṃgāṇāṃ mahāraṃgaḥ kaṃkuṣṭahiṃgulukarājapaṭyādayas te gandhakuṭyāṃ prakṣeptavyāḥ pratimopayogikāḥ /
K01vinv07_u:4128: khaṃkhaṭikaṃ gaurikaṃ nīliś ca saṃghena bhājayitvyā /
K01vinv07_u:4132: māṃ bhikṣavaḥ śāstāram uddiśadbhir madyam adeyam apeyam antataḥ kuśāgreṇāpi /
K01vinv07_u:4136: ratnānāṃ muktā varjayitvā maṇivaiḍūryadakṣiṇāvartaparyantāni tu dvau bhāgau kartavyānīti /
K01vinv07_u:4142: pustakānāṃ buddhavacanapustakā avibhajya cāturdiśāya bhikṣusaṃghāya dhāraṇakoṣṭhikāyāṃ prakṣeptavyāḥ /
K01vinv07_u:4144: patralekhyaṃ yac chīghraṃ śakyate sādhayituṃ tasya dravyavibhāge tad bhikṣubhir bhājayitavyam* /
K01vinv07_u:4145: na śakyate tac cāturdiśāya bhikṣusaṃghāya dhāraṇa /
K01vinv07_u:4147: suvarṇaṃ ca hiraṇyaṃ cānyac ca kṛtākṛtaṃ trayo bhāgāḥ kartavyāḥ /
K01vinv07_u:4151: yo buddhasya tena gandhakuṭyāṃ keśanakhastūpeṣu ca khaṇḍachuṭṭaṃ pratisaṃskartavyam* /
K01vinv07_u:4152: yo dharmasya tena buddhavacanaṃ lekhayitavyaṃ siṃhāsanena vā upayoktavyam* /
K01vinv07_u:4155: yadā rājñā prasenajitā kosalenā toyikāmahaḥ prasthāpitas tadā tatra bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ mahāsannipāto bhavati /
K01vinv07_u:4156: tena khalu samayena mūlaphalguno bhikṣur bhikṣuṇībhāvanīyaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:4183: tena tāsām anurakṣayā stokastokaṃ gṛhītvā pūrvāhṇikā kṛtā /
K01vinv07_u:4184: tataiva velāyāṃ bhuktam akāle pānakaṃ ca pītam* /
K01vinv07_u:4205: ity etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti /
K01vinv07_u:4207: ānandena sthāpitaṃ bhikṣuṇā prativastu mṛtapariṣkārikam adhiṣṭhātavyam* /
K01vinv07_u:4209: śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā gaṇḍīm ākoṭya pṛṣṭavācikayā bhikṣūn samanuyujya sarvasaṃghe saṃniṣaṇṇe saṃnipatite ekena bhikṣuṇā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā karma kartavyam* /
K01vinv07_u:4212: tasya pātracīvaraṃ sacīvaracīvarikam ānandasya haste tiṣṭhati /
K01vinv07_u:4214: yat saṃgho mūlaphalgunasya bhikṣoḥ pātracīvaraṃ sacīvaracīvarikam ānandena bhikṣuṇā prativastu mṛtapariṣkārikam adhitiṣṭhed ity eṣā jñaptiḥ
K01vinv07_u:4216: anyatra bhadanta bhikṣuḥ kālaṃ kuryād anyatrāsya pātracīvaram anyatra prativastukaḥ /
K01vinv07_u:4218: yo 'tra upālin prativastuko bhikṣur gṛhī vā /
K01vinv07_u:4220: tena khalu samayena navakarmiko bhikṣuḥ kālagataḥ /
K01vinv07_u:4221: bhikṣavas tasya pātracīvaraṃ kaukṛtyān na bhājayanti /
K01vinv07_u:4230: tasya pātracīvaraṃ sacīvaracīvarikaṃ trīn bhāgān kartavyam* /
K01vinv07_u:4235: buddhasantakena buddhapūjā vā gandhakūṭyāṃ stūpe vā navakarma kartavyam* /
K01vinv07_u:4238: na cet sambhinnakārī sarvam eva bhikṣubhir bhājayitavyam* /
K01vinv07_u:4241: tena khalu samayena saṃbahulā bhikṣavo janapadacārikāṃ caranto 'nupūrveṇa srāvastyām upanagaram anuprāptāḥ* /
K01vinv07_u:4246: śrāvastī tannivāsibhir gopālakaiḥ paśupālakais tṛṇahārakaiḥ kāṣṭhahārakaiḥ pathājīvair utpathājīvaiś ca manuṣyaiḥ samantād ākīrṇā /
K01vinv07_u:4247: te yatra yatra niṣīdanti bhājayāma iti tatra tatra mahājanena parivāryante /
K01vinv07_u:4276: tena khalu samayena bhikṣuṇā bhikṣor haste bhikṣoś cīvarāṇi preṣitāni /
K01vinv07_u:4277: tena bhikṣuṇā yena preṣitāni tasya niśvāsena paribhuktāni /
K01vinv07_u:4280: aviśvāse bhikṣavas tena bhikṣuṇā viśvāsam utpāditam* /
K01vinv07_u:4281: yasya yena bhikṣuṇā preṣitāni tasya tena viśvāsena paribhuktāni /
K01vinv07_u:4282: api tu bhikṣur bhikṣor haste bhikṣoś cīvarakāṇi preṣayati /
K01vinv07_u:4292: yasya preṣitāni tasya kalpena tasya mṛtapariṣkārikam adhitiṣṭhati /
K01vinv07_u:4296: yena preṣitāni tasya kalpena mṛtapariṣkārikam adhitiṣṭhati /
K01vinv07_u:4306: yasya preṣitāni tasya kalpena mṛtapariṣkārikam adhitiṣṭhati /
K01vinv07_u:4308: yena preṣitāni tasya kalpena mṛtapariṣkārikam adhitiṣṭhati /
K01vinv07_u:4315: yena preṣitāni tasya kalpena mṛtapariṣkārikam adhitiṣṭhati /
K01vinv07_u:4321: yasya preṣitāni tasya kalpena mṛtapariṣkāram adhitiṣṭhati /
K01vinv07_u:4323: yena preṣitāni tasya kalpena mṛtapariṣkārikam adhitiṣṭhati /
